SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,100 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.OSB_ENVIRONMENT :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_LOGGING
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Session Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_SESSION_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File to import" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_FILE_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
java -version export WEBLOGIC_HOME=/oracle/fmwhome/wlserver_10.3 echo $WEBLOGIC_HOME ! -----------------------------------Preparing the create session command to run python script------------------------------------------------------------------- ! set AGENT working directory : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
: SET &PYTHON_FILE_NAME# = "IMPORT_RESOURCE" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_PYTHON
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
! SESSION NAME : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_OSB_SESSION_NAME# : SET &UC4RB_IMPORT_RESOURCE_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_OSB_ESC_VALUE#"')
! Resource to import : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_OSB_FILE_PATH# : SET &UC4RB_IMPORT_RESOURCE_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IMPORT_RESOURCE_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_OSB_ESC_VALUE#"')
! printing the command formed : PRINT "IMPORT CMD :: &UC4RB_IMPORT_RESOURCE_CMD#" !. /oracle/fmwhome/user_projects/domains/dev_soasuite/bin/setDomainEnv.sh !java weblogic.WLST "/home/oracle/tmp/pck_osb_import_resource.py" "weblogic" "welcome1" "t3://127.0.0.1:7001" "aesession-1" "/home/oracle/tmp/testproject.jar"
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.RUN_WLST &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# = &UC4RB_IMPORT_RESOURCE_CMD#
!-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** IMPORT RESOURCE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** IMPORT RESOURCE ACTION FAILED ********"
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
